description:
All of the volume operations in the functional api client helper methods has 'volumes' for the URL instead of 'os-volumes' (https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/functional/api/client.py#L307). [Link to API guide: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html#os-volumes].

This will cause any tests that want to use that helper method to get a 404 instead of their desired function.
title: Functional API client has incorrect URL for volumes

comments.content:
All of the volume operations in the functional api client helper methods has 'volumes' for the URL instead of 'os-volumes' (https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/functional/api/client.py#L307). [Link to API guide: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html#os-volumes].

This will cause any tests that want to use that helper method to get a 404 instead of their desired function.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlrossit

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/291464
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/291464
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=50f4f95ae42fd85d98e4a4426a7ecb1096664d6d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 50f4f95ae42fd85d98e4a4426a7ecb1096664d6d
Author: Ryan Rossiter <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Mar 10 22:07:09 2016 +0000

    Add regression test for Cinder 403 forwarding
    
    The Nova API should be returning a 403 whenever it gets a Forbidden from
    Cinder. Nova currently only returns a 403 when it runs into a policy
    exception from its own policy (which is a subclass of Forbidden). This
    changes the handler over to return a 403 when any Forbidden comes in.
    
    Also, the volume helper methods in the function API client had incorrect
    URLs, so those were also fixed (/volumes --> /os-volumes)
    
    Change-Id: If9dd002454338d07fcea0c2092c12f3961c3dcdf
    Partial-Bug: #1554631
    Closes-Bug: #1555826
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
